name: snarl
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.
